channel.title: c50 on dfangx's website
channel.description: Recent content in c50 on dfangx's website

item.title: Day 130, Psalm 50, 53, 60, 75
item.description: Psalm 50 expresses how God looks at the heart. God puts into perspective how the simple acts of sacrifice without having a heart after God mean nothing.

item.title: Day 29, Genesis 48-50
item.description: The progression of the final story is different, as one would expect for God to appear to the next inheritor of the Abrahamic covenant.
